member.name: T:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Bindings.BindingExtensions

member.name: T:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackchannelClientSettingsBase
member.summary: This abstract class defines a minimum set of configuration settings for a client credential OAuth verified backchannel API client.
member.remarks: The class can be inherited and used for a variety of client configurations, including but not limited to, an SCIM client.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackchannelClientSettingsBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client functionality is enabled.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackchannelClientSettingsBase.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client identifier.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackchannelClientSettingsBase.ResourceUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the resource URI.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackchannelClientSettingsBase.Secret
member.summary: Gets or sets the secret.

member.name: T:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackplaneType
member.summary: Contains an enumerated list of SignalR backplane types

member.name: F:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackplaneType.None
member.summary: No backplane connection shall be attempted.
member.remarks: Typically used for single instances of the application.

member.name: F:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackplaneType.Redis
member.summary: A Redis pub/sub server shall be used as backplane for web-farm and Azure scaled application instances.

member.name: F:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.BackplaneType.Azure
member.summary: An Azure SignalR Service shall be used for SignalR communication.

member.name: T:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.NotificationSettings
member.summary: Contains server settings related to notifications.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.NotificationSettings.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether administrator has disabled SignalR notifications.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.NotificationSettings.BackingType
member.summary: Gets or sets the backplane notifications type.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.NotificationSettings.AlternativeRedisConnectionConfig
member.summary: Gets or sets an alternative Redis connection string for alternative backplane server different from the default Redis connection string.

member.name: P:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Configuration.NotificationSettings.BackplaneChannelPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the server instance backplane channel prefix. This allows for a channel to be created for a specific application instance environment/slot with unique name.
member.remarks: Messages sent over the channel will continue to have sub-channel traffic based off of the requestor or server domain key for multi-tenant server instances.

member.name: T:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions

member.summary: Contains the backchannel claim type.

member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's user name.
member.returns: Returns the user name claim value if found.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.SubjectId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's subject identity value.
member.returns: Returns the subject identity claim value if found.

member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's email claim value.
member.returns: Returns the email claim value if found.

member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's phone number claim value.
member.returns: Returns the phone number claim value if found.

member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's mobile phone number claim value.
member.param: Contains a value indicating whether the "mobile" claim type shall be used.
member.returns: Returns the phone number claim value if found.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GivenName(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's given (first) name claim value.
member.returns: Returns the given name claim value if found.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.FamilyName(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's family (last) name claim value.
member.returns: Returns the family name claim value if found.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.TimeZone(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's time zone claim value.
member.returns: Returns the time zone claim value if found.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.Locale(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This extension method gets the principal's locale claim value.
member.returns: Returns the locale claim value if found.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.IsBackchannel(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This extension method gets a value indicating whether this instance is backchannel.
member.returns: true if the specified principal is backchannel; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.FullName(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: This method the last name of the current user.
member.returns: Returns the user name.

member.name: T:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions
member.summary: This class contains extensions to support image binary content within the application.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions.Rescale(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This extension method is used to rescale the specified bitmap into the width and height dimensions specified.
member.param: Contains the source image to rescale.
Contains the new bitmap width size.
Contains the new bitmap height size.
member.returns: Returns a new rescaled bitmap of the source with specified width and height.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions.Thumbnail(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This extension method is used to properly rescale an image into a smaller thumbnail.
member.param: Contains the source bitmap image to resize
Contains the new thumbnail image width.
Contains the new thumbnail image height.
member.returns: Returns a new image containing the scaled thumbnail image.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions.WriteThumbnail(System.IO.Stream,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: This extension method is used to properly rescale an image into a smaller thumbnail and write to a specified stream.
member.param: Contains the stream where the new thumbnail image shall be written to.
Contains the source bitmap image to resize
Contains the new thumbnail image width.
Contains the new thumbnail image height.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions.CreateThumbnail(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is used to create a thumbnail for a specified binary file content data.
member.param: Contains the binary image contents to convert to a thumbnail
Contains an optional thumbnail width in pixels.
Contains an optional thumbnail height in pixels.
member.returns: Returns the thumbnail image binary contents

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions.CreateThumbnail(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is used to create a thumbnail for a specified binary file stream data.
member.param: Contains the file stream for the binary component image data.
Contains an optional thumbnail width in pixels.
Contains an optional thumbnail height in pixels.
member.returns: Returns a byte array.

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Extensions.ImageExtensions.ToByteArray(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: This method is used to convert a Bitmap image object to an array of bytes.
member.param: Contains the bitmap image object to convert.
member.returns: Returns a byte array representing the image bitmap.

member.returns: Returns true if the standards were met

member.summary: This method is used to determine if a password meets the settings length standards

Contains the maximum number of characters

member.summary: This method is used to calculate the complexity of the password specified

member.returns: Returns the calculated password complexity level

member.summary: This method returns a randomly generated password based on specific criteria in settings
member.returns: Returns the random text

member.summary: This method returns a randomly generated password based on specific criteria in settings
member.param: The minimum number of lower-case letters
The minimum number of upper-case letters
The minimum number of numeric characters
The minimum number of special characters

member.summary: This method is used to get a random position within the password character array
member.param: The password array to look within
member.returns: Returns a randomly selected available character space within the password array

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Helpers.PasswordHelper.FoundInDictionary(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to determine if a password was found in the password dictionary verbatim.
member.param: Contains the password text to evaluate
member.returns: Returns true if the password text was found

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Helpers.PasswordHelper.SpansEnoughCharacterSets(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is used to determine if the password spans enough character set evaluations
member.param: Contains the password text to evaluate
Contains the minimum number of character set evaluations to meet
member.returns: Returns true if the password text meets the minimum number of sets

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Helpers.PasswordHelper.IsCloseVariationOfAWordInDictionary(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: This method is used to determine if the password is within a certain ratio of like-ness to words in dictionary
member.param: Contains the password text to evaluate
Contains the minimum variation ratio to meet before returning true
member.returns: Returns true if the word is close to a dictionary word

member.name: M:Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Helpers.PasswordHelper.IsCharOfType(System.Char,Talegen.AspNetCore.Web.Helpers.PasswordCharType)
